issue.title: [JAVA] Add support for custom metadata in org.apache.arrow.vector.types.pojo.*
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1045](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1045). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Custom metadata for Arrow Schema and Arrow Fields is lost if a user translates to/from the Java implementations pojo helper objects. Conversion to/from the Flatbuf schema should be lossless.
